T02D2612:84a-1: badzra manydzu shr'i gha tra bi dhi:/
T02D2612:84a-3: 'jam dpal rdo rje'i bum pa'i cho ga /'phags pa
T02D2612:84a-4: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D2612:84a-5: // sgrub pa po la phan gdags zhing //
T02D2612:84a-6: nyon mongs dri ma kun dag phyir //
T02D2612:84a-7: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gang zag la //
T02D2612:84b-0: bum pa'i @84b cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D2612:84b-1: dang por mtshan nyid ldan gnas su //
T02D2612:84b-2: sa slong sbyong zhing mandala bya //
T02D2612:84b-3: thig gdab tshon ni byin gyis brlab //
T02D2612:84b-4: tshom bu lnga ldan 'khor lo bcu drug ldan //
T02D2612:84b-5: gru chad bzhi ldan sgo bzhi rta babs ldan //
T02D2612:84b-6: 'khor lo bcu drug gru chad bzhi dang ldan //
T02D2612:84b-7: panytsa ratna 'dod yon snam bu dang //
T02D2612:84b-8: rin chen pa gu sgo bzhi rta babs bri //
T02D2612:84b-9: rin chen bdun las byas pa'i mchod pa'i rten //
T02D2612:84b-10: gdugs dang bdan cod pan dril bus brgyan //
T02D2612:84b-11: gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags las byas //
T02D2612:84b-12: bum pa kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2612:84b-13: rin chen sna lnga 'bru sna lnga dang ni //
T02D2612:84b-14: sman lnga dri lnga dkar la sogs pa'i rdzas //
T02D2612:84b-15: bdud rtsi'i chus bkang kha rgyan 'bras bu can / mgul chings gzungs thag bum pa'i rigs dang spyar //
T02D2612:84b-16: so so'i lha yi gdan du gnyis po dgod //
T02D2612:84b-17: dang por bla ma dkon mchog spyan drang ste //
T02D2612:84b-18: phyag mchod sdig bshags yi rang bskor bar bskul //
T02D2612:84b-19: mya ngan mi 'da' lus dbul dge rtsa bsngo //
T02D2612:84b-20: tshad med bzhi ldan byang chub mchog tu bsngo //
T02D2612:84b-21: stong pa'i ting 'dzin sngags kyis kun nas bskul //
T02D2612:84b-22: de nas grur dang dra ba'i steng du ni //
T02D2612:84b-23: h'um las rdo rje brum las mchod rten ni //
T02D2612:84b-24: hr'i las chos 'byung aa las rdo rje'o //
T02D2612:84b-25: de steng bhr'um las gzhal yas khang pa'o //
T02D2612:84b-26: gdan lnga zla ba'i gdan ni so sor gsal //
T02D2612:84b-27: yi ge aa las rnal 'byor rnam gsum bsgom //
T02D2612:84b-28: dam tshig 'khor lo aa las sku bskyed do //
T02D2612:84b-29: ye shes 'khor lo dgug cing bstim par bya //
T02D2612:84b-30: sku gsum byin brlabs dbang bskur nyid kyis mtshan //
T02D2612:84b-31: thabs dang shes rab bum pa rab tu don //
T02D2612:84b-32: thabs dang shes rab 'od zer bdud rtsi dbab //
T02D2612:84b-33: mchod rten rnams ni lha yi rang bzhin gsal //
T02D2612:84b-34: so so'i thabs dang shes rab ma lus ldan //
T02D2612:84b-35: thugs ka'i aa las rgyud ni gdon par bya ;
T02D2612:84b-36: / da [*de?] las dad pa'i sangs rgyas 'dud bstod bya //
T02D2612:84b-37: de yi thugs 'od mchod pa rnam lngas mchod //
T02D2612:84b-38: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / rnam par dag pa bdag med chos //
T02D2612:84b-39: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang //
T02D2612:84b-40: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
T02D2612:85a-0: rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus @85a * //
T02D2612:85a-2: / ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang //
T02D2612:85a-3: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / las kyi khams rnams zad byed cing //
T02D2612:85a-4: chu bo rgya mtsho kun las brgal //
T02D2612:85a-5: nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs //
T02D2612:85a-6: bag chags bcas pa gtan du spangs //
T02D2612:85a-8: / lung dang man ngag la brten nas //
T02D2612:85a-9: bdag gis 'di 'dra'i phan gdags cho ga brtsams //
T02D2612:85a-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba dri med gang thob pa //
T02D2612:85a-11: des ni 'jam dpal rdo rje thob par shog /
T02D2612:85a-12: dpal 'jam dpal mgon po'i bum pa'i cho ga /
T02D2612:85a-13: slob dpon chen po mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis
T02D2612:85a-16: // / dpal au rgyan gyi mkhan po chen po dharma shr'i mi tra'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02D2612:85a-17: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bod kyi sh'akya'i dge
